fields.summary: Nodemanagers have DDoS our namenode due to HDFS_DELEGATION_TOKEN expired or not in the cache

status.description: A patch for this issue has been uploaded to JIRA by a contributor.
status.name: Patch Available

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: The aggregated log file does not appear to be properly closed when writes fail.  This leaves a lease renewer active in the NM that spams the NN with lease renewals.  If the token is marked not to be cancelled, the renewals appear to continue until the token expires.  If the token is cancelled, the periodic renew spam turns into a flood of failed connections until the lease renewer gives up.

comments.body: Cancelled tokens trigger the retry proxy bug.
Without any logs, not sure we are can debug further, close.

bq. the ctor creates the fs data stream then a TFile.Writer w/o a try/catch. If the TFile.Writer ctor throws an exception, it's impossible to close the stream.
YARN-6288 is in flight to fix this issue.
Will upload a patch to address the other issue that ISE causes FSDataStream leak.
